text: Akrotiri and Dhekelia are two British overseas territories that border the Republic of Cyprus. They are used as military bases by the United Kingdom. The bases were kept by the United Kingdom after Cyprus changed from being a colony in the British Empire, to being an independent republic. The United Kingdom kept them because of the important location of Cyprus in the Mediterranean Sea. == Military bases == The smallest of the bases is known as Akrotiri Sovereign Base Area or even the Western Sovereign Base Area. == References == ==Other websites== Category:British overseas territories Category:Geography of Cyprus Category:Military buildings and structures
